name: The Webmaster
message: First post! Welcome to the DemonicSkull.com guestbook! Please sign it and let me know what you think. This site is a labor of love and I hope you all enjoy it. More content coming soon! Long live Monkey Island! Long live Murray!

name: MurrayTheSkull
message: BWAHAHAHAHA! A website dedicated to ME, the all-powerful demonic skull?! EXCELLENT! At last, the mortals recognize my true power! Now if someone could just help me sign this guestbook... I seem to be lacking in the "hands" department.

name: StanTheSalesman
message: Have I got a deal for YOU! This site is PREVIOUSLY OWNED but in MINT CONDITION! Act NOW and I'll throw in a free bookmark! But seriously, great site. Stan approves! Previously-owned approval, but approval nonetheless! *waves arms wildly*

name: VoodooLady
message: I sense... a great disturbance in the web. A new fan site has been born, and it is... GOOD. Seriously though, nice work! The layout is clean and loads fast on my 56k modem. Bookmarked!

name: GrogDrinker
message: YOU FIGHT LIKE A DAIRY FARMER!! Haha just kidding. Cool site man. The Murray quotes are hilarious, I forgot about half of these. Makes me want to replay Curse again for the 5th time. Does anyone know when the next MI game is coming out???

name: ThreepwoodJr
message: This site is better than a fine leather jacket! (get it?? LOL) Seriously though, great content. The games page has all the info I was looking for. One thing - could you add a section about the MI2 ending? I STILL don't understand it!!

name: LeChucksDad
message: Found your site through the Monkey Island Webring. Really cool! I run LeChuck's Lair (see links page) and would love to do a link exchange. Email me! Also, nice choice going with the dark color scheme - very fitting for a Murray site.

name: ElaineFan
message: Great site!! Love the insult sword fighting guide - I've been stuck on the Sword Master for WEEKS and your guide helped me beat her! THANK YOU!! More Elaine content please! :)

name: SkullKing2000
message: Murray is the BEST character in any game EVER. Period. No arguments. This site does him justice. I especially like the animated Murray GIF in the header - very cool! Would love to see some MIDI files of the game music!

name: PirateFan_99
message: AWESOME site!!! The Murray shrine is the best thing on the internet! I've been looking for a good MI site for months and this is IT. Keep up the great work! Can you add a wallpaper section?
